reviews.title: Accessibility and Login Issues
reviews.text: Continue to have login issues, issues recognizing subscription, font is tiny. Access to the digital subscription is really hit or miss. As one reviewer pointed out, at least I don’t have to search for my subscriber number!
reviews.author: ElroyandJudy

reviews.title: TLS great; accessibility mediocre.
reviews.text: Not just clunky navigation — but print on ipad unnecessarily tiny and not adjustable.   Their writers deserve better
reviews.author: Mikesho
